divs: Sighting DetailsSeveral sets of triangular shaped lights, all of which had various sizes, moving very slowly across the sky as if to avoid detection. Appeared at first to be stars. Was sitting in the park when i first noticed them.
Summary: several triangular sets of lights moving very slowly
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around November 4th 2013
